column4: is there a way to have ubuntu show me live hardware changed in my computer?
I bet your computer doesnt support that, besides USB.
I am not looking for hotplugging or anything
A computer basically never beeps on hw changes :)
So you are on a windows machine now?
Then, I am afraid, we cant help you in here.
Only if you are on Ubuntu. :)
Why dont you finally boot an Ubuntu livecd?
Stop it now please. Boot an Ubuntu, and we might can help you.
Then WHY dont you finally reboot into an Ubuntu?
Then USE Ubuntu to have the UBUNTU logs.
